name: Shoot N' Scoot
description: Shoot 'n Scoot is local co-op action arcade game where players are attempting to get the most points by shooting their opponents off of their chairs by using a variety of guns and items.  The catch is that players can only move through the recoil from their guns.   Players must maneuver themselves around the map, collecting guns and items to defeat their opponents.  The game supports up to 4 players and is played with gamepad controllers.
